reporter-output.line:
T Given user launches application
T user launches application
T And login to the application with 'mmt1@mailinator.com' and '@H$hackathon2'
T click on 'login.btn.email.clear'
T sendKeys 'mmt1@mailinator.com' into 'login.input.email'
T click on 'login.btn.continue'
T click on 'login.btn.via.password'
T sendKeys '@H$hackathon2' into {loc}
T click on 'login.btn.submit'
T Then verify user should logged into the application
T assert 'home.icon.profile' is present
P Expected By.id: profile present : Actual By.id: profile present [View Screenshot]
T When user navigates to the 'Hotels'
T And select a location 'Udaipur'
T click on 'hotel.search.link.city'
T sendKeys 'Udaipur' into 'hotel.search.input.city'
T And select a '2 June 2020' and '5 June 2020' dates
T And add '2' rooms for '2' adults & '2' children each
T click on 'hotel.search.layout.rooms'
T click on 'hotel.search.btn.children.add'
T click on 'hotel.search.btn.children.add'
T click on 'hotel.search.btn.adults.add'
T click on 'hotel.search.btn.children.add'
T click on 'hotel.search.btn.children.add'
T click on 'hotel.search.btn.guests.done'
T And select travelling for 'Family'
T And search for the options
T click on 'hotel.search.btn.submit'
T When user navigates to Sort and Filter page
T click on 'home.sortfilter.menu'
T When user filters by price by setting '1000' value
T And apply filter by user rating '4.0 & Above'
T Then user applys filter
T click on 'hotel.search.btn.filter.apply'
T When user scroll and select the '5' item from filter result page
T wait until 'hotel.list' to be present
T get text of 'hotel.item.name'
T get text of 'hotel.item.name'
T get text of 'hotel.item.name'
T get text of 'hotel.item.name'
T get text of 'hotel.item.name'
T get text of 'hotel.item.name'
T click on 'hotel.item.name'
T And capture the room details and click SELECT ROOM options
T get text of 'hotel.detail.txt.title'
T wait until 'hotel.detail.btn.selectroom' to be visible
T click on 'hotel.detail.btn.selectroom'
T get text of 'hotel.room.category.detail.txt.name'
T get text of 'hotel.room.category.detail.txt.discountedprice'
T get text of 'hotel.room.category.detail.txt.originalprice'
T click on 'hotel.detail.btn.continue'
T And user fills traveller information
T click on 'guest.select.title'
T sendKeys 'Nishith' into 'guest.input.first.name'
T sendKeys 'Shah' into 'guest.input.last.name'
T sendKeys '7069936462' into 'guest.input.mobile.no'
T And selects two options from commonly requested option
T click on 'guest.btn.special.request.done'
T And uncheck the donation checkbox
T And click on PAY NOW option
T click on 'booking.btn.continue'
T Then verify user should see booking summary page with correct requested data
P Expected By.id: tvHotelNameOnThankYouPage text should be ContainsIgnoringCase:Hotel Castle Comfort by Castle Hotels : Actual By.id: tvHotelNameOnThankYouPage text is Hotel Castle Comfort by Castle Hotels [View Screenshot]
P Expected By.id: tvHotelAddressOnThankYouPage text should be ContainsIgnoringCase:Udaipur : Actual By.id: tvHotelAddressOnThankYouPage text is Udaipur, Rajasthan , India [View Screenshot]
T click on 'booking.review.btn.expand.details'
P Expected By.id: tvNumOfGuestOnThankYouPage text should be ContainsIgnoringCase:8 : Actual By.id: tvNumOfGuestOnThankYouPage text is 8 Guests [View Screenshot]
P Expected By.id: tvTotalRoomsBookedOnThankYouPage text should be ContainsIgnoringCase:2 : Actual By.id: tvTotalRoomsBookedOnThankYouPage text is 2 Rooms [View Screenshot]
P Expected By.id: tvCheckInDateOnThankYouPage text should be ContainsIgnoringCase:31 : Actual By.id: tvCheckInDateOnThankYouPage text is 31 MAY, SUN [View Screenshot]
P Expected By.id: tvCheckOutDateOnThankYouPage text should be ContainsIgnoringCase:01 : Actual By.id: tvCheckOutDateOnThankYouPage text is 01 JUN, MON [View Screenshot]
